description: Learn Spanish by immersing yourself in a world of interesting, authentic Spanish content! With LingQ, the smart Spanish app.  Start with easy beginner lessons but quickly progress into learning Spanish from real, compelling material. 1000s of hours of Spanish lessons, podcasts, audiobooks, interviews and more, all with transcript. This lets you take advantage of dead time and short breaks throughout the day to spend more time with your Spanish.  No other app will take you as far. LingQ will teach you how to speak Spanish (espanol) in no time!
